context: A security incident involving suspicious service registration was flagged indicating a system program `services.exe` was registered as a service. This can indicate malicious intent to establish persistence or gain system privileges.
question: There is also an attempt to hide the use of a dual-purpose tool under an unexpected filename in the same incident. Can you find the name of the account involved in this activity?
solution_steps: A system program was registered as a service on host `mb-adfs`, which could indicate malicious intent to establish persistence or gain system privileges.
The account `gsmith` was detected attempting to hide the use of a dual-purpose tool under an unexpected filename, indicating potential malicious activity.
